project1.title: Local Weather
project1.description: This Project allows you to sign in as a user. You can check the forecast for the day a or for the next five days. Also, I you see a day that you really like you can add it to your favorites
project1.technologiesUsed: firebase,jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Movie Maker
project2.description: We were assigned this movie maker project in which we needed to create a way to set a budget, have a progress bar that corresponded a condition of having an element selected in all four categories. We had to display a message that states you could not make the movie until that condition is met as well as going over budget. We also had to display a message that states you can now make the movie when the requirements are met.
project2.technologiesUsed: jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Nutshell
project3.description: This site like a place where you can share various things and acquire friends. You can add and remove freinds and messages. you share articles and tasks you are looking to complete and more. Just check it out
project3.technologiesUsed: firebase, jQuery, AJAX and JSON, Task Automation, CSS Animations, Version Control with Github

project4.title: Front End Capstone - MuncherTrux
project4.description: As a food truck business owner, you can create your own profile that wil display information about your company as well as the events you plan to attend. If you are a user of this site, you have the ability to see al the food trucks and where you can find them according to what events they will be attending;
project4.technologiesUsed: Firebase, React,Task Automation, SCSS Animations, Version Control with Github
